content.detailedDescription: Object appeared in the sky brightly, with blue and red lights, with an interference-like sound that burns the ears, supersonic type, but without vibration, measured approximately 6 to 8 meters, was the height of 250 meters and then moved away and remained the same distance as commercial airplanes flies but from a low distance and stood statically for approximately 10 minutes, where the sky was clear, clear and cloudless. object of triangular shape, aspect of chrome metal and with the lights that were cited above, as mirrored led light, and, at home appeared a creature of short stature, yellow color beige, skin like snake all smooth and soaked in oil , large black eyes, a 6-year-old child's body, large and misshapen feet and small arms and large hands and body and all limbs with black spots and scratches. big head well disproportionate. it was 45 cm away. apparently lowered. both the et and the disk appeared around 12:00 pm
content.summary: Big, gray, silent, circular, speed

content.detailedDescription: Its comeing clos
content.summary: It s coming

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to relax and saw a strange cloud shape in the sky. it was unusual so i took a couple of quick pics with my camera phone. i do not recall hearing a sonic boom, however, it is possible that is why i was drawn to look up. it would not be unreasonable to think this was a plane breaking the sound barrier. later when looking at one of the photos i noticed a brown looking object above the cloud. it was either the object that made the cloud or it kinda looks like something may have flown through the cloud in pursuit of what ever made the cloud. i can't tell, i don't have any picture enhancing software, so who knows. maybe you all can make something of it. let me know if you can. thanks.
content.summary: Went outside saw sonic looking cloud, took pic with camera phone.

It was a object with extremely bright strobing lights that where white and could be seen for at least 10 miles the lights seemed to spread in a horizontal line but  that was really wide it was to hard to see the how wide because of how fast it was moving

content.detailedDescription: I was in a hostal in birmingham england having a bbq with about 15 other people. one of tje lads present said wots that in the sky. we all looked up and several ppl said " i dont know" i looked but couldnt see anything. one off the staff said look to the left off the sun andrea, so i did and thats wen i saw the object. it was a round really bright object which was stationery at first. it then zoomed to the left and then took a sharp right to just before where i first saw it. then took another sharp turn to the left again and disappeared out off our sight. the speed it went was surprising to all off us. i felt really weird thinking wot the heck was that. within 2 mins off it disappearing ppl just started eating their food. i tried to talk in detail to everyone anout it but they just were not interested to talk about it. i was excited but scared and bewildered why noone found this as amazing as i did
content.summary: A white bright round object

content.detailedDescription: I was outside after the news to observe , and noticed the cylinder come in from the west, it stopped and the dome light came on then was turned off and a red then blue light flashed off/on down the side of the cylinder and then a bright white light on the bottom came on/off. the sequence was repeated for a minute or so. off to the left of the cylinder maybe 3-400 yards a star like object appeared and a beam  of light shot to the cylinder for a few seconds 2-3 seconds only and the cylinder exited west at a high rate of speed and disappeared.  the star light object stayed just a few seconds and was gone.
content.summary: Observed cylinder shaped ufo coming from the west, stationary for 5 minutes lights off/on.

content.detailedDescription: I recently read ufos over new york by preston dennett. it was the first time i became aware that twa flight 800 had been documented as being shot down by a ufo. as stated above, i dreamt that night about a jet to the south being shot down by a blaze of white light. i then dreamt i went downstairs and out the front door into the sunlight and encountered a craft that reminded me of a small space shuttle type vehicle standing on 'legs and feet'. it was translucent/transparent and glowed in a hazy way. it was phosphorescent with areas of lime green, yellow, orange, white. it just sat there. as i am terribly afraid of ufos, i did not linger and went back inside. though it was a dream, the sighting of the craft feels like a real event to me, while the witnessing of the jet being shot down was part of a dream. obviously i have never forgotten this and reading the account in dennett's book validates my experience. as i followed the news coverage of the event with great interest at the time, i was always certain the plane had been indeed shot down.
content.summary: This was the night twa flight 800 crashed. i dreamt i saw a beam of light shoot down the plane. then in the morning i went outside and the craft was parked in front of my house. isolated rural setting.

content.detailedDescription: On 5/12/17 we were coming out of big bend national park, tx. we pulled over on the side of the road to watch the moon rise.-10pm.Ish no moon yet.  while looking over the field with my night vision binoculars,i saw the 1st orb about 40 ft. away.  it was about 4 feet off the ground and kept going behind the bushes/brush when i shined the ir-flashlight on it. i  thought it was a reflection from a deer's eye because when i looked without the inferred-binoculars(naked eye) i couldn't see anything. it was a big white ball that was reflecting the ir-light from my binocuars and my hand held infer-red flashlight. i watched it for about 30 seconds. then my friend said "what is that?".  i turned around to see a bright green orb approach us from the west about 50yards away.  it stayed about 6 feet off the ground and moved slowly towards us until it was about 10-15 yards away.  then it stopped for about 15 seconds. it didn't move and never made a sound.  we just stared at it asking each other "what is it?". then it slowly moved north in the middle of the road for about 30 seconds till it disappeared. it never fluttered or blinked. both orbs were about the size of a big softball. we just stood there kind of confused. we weren't frighted at all and i had my gun on me.  i still don't know why i didn't approach it. it's not like me to not have gone up to it and try to touch or investigate it. i plan on going back out there in a few days(june,19-22. 2017) to see it again and try to make contact.
content.summary: One invisable/ir. one green orb. softball size.  6ft off the ground and 30ft at closest.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home with my girlfriend and her friend carrying pizza we bought for takeout. i felt the need to look up and slightly to the right [nw] while walking down the sidewalk and saw what i thought was a very bright star just sitting in the sky. it was a bright glowing white/silvery color. it was between the size of the north star and an asprin pill.  it then became very bright and dimmed out of existance while shooting about 3-5 degrees away from me. this was all very fast and i really didn't know what i saw or believe anything could go that fast. 

i then thought about it for a couple seconds and blurted out to my girlfriend and her friend that i think i saw a ufo or something and they laughed and said they didn't see anything. i can't stop thinking about it. i got home a couple of minutes later and felt like i was being watched over my shoulder or something.
content.summary: I was walking home and i felt like looking up. i saw what i thought was a big star that got really bright and the dimmed out of existance while shooting up towards the sky. this was all within about 10 seconds. i've never seen anything move that fast!

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home, just like last year this time. i had gone out side to check on the solar and put the panels down. as i began to move towards the generator i felt they where and i could hear them in my mind. i looked up immediately and that's when, i saw the first ship moving into position. then it moved straight up into the mother ship. i ran in and got my canon 60d eos camera and began taking pictures. i watched and took pictures of 7 ships moving over the valley and cloaking them selfs same as clouds. i have i hope on my camera them despising something in the air. that came from the mother ship herself. no i now i do. the mother ship backed up. i also watched 5 ship line up and reinter her. then she left leaving a dark line behind her. to others it would look like a cloud but it was not. when the ship mover it was fantastic to watch how not only the clouds moved and rolled under her belly, but the propulsion movement was slow and not a sound. two ship where left behind, i saw them when i  went back out to turn on the generator. i know they will be back. i have over 2000 pic of them. i tried to get the mother ship on video, but the lighting was so bad i couldn't. i did get too of the ship one upside down and the other docked close to it upright.
what do they look like, silver gray in color. at the front of the ship 3 sharp points that could destroy another vessels if rated.  it would shredded the hull of any other vessels. the small vessels had the same front end. if they decide to do battle we are f--k. that's a fact. there not afraid of us at all. i  am not afraid of them at this time ither. this very high in gold and silver. i have pictures of what i  call sky drilling. because that's what's it looks like there doing. 
the reason i  have not sent you pictures is one i can't download them on to my laptop yet. i do not have enough room and i don't have them equipment i need yet. i will have more money to get this done soon. i am also copyright ingredients all of them. i  take care of my father whom has dementia, i stay home and lot.
  6/12/17. as i  took a brake from putting this report in i knew i  need to go out side with my camera and the there they where. i  got great video this time. two mother ships and another large one, ships coming and going and one leaving. omg noel has ever seen this many ships ever. it's 9:30 pm and there still here.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Mother ship as long as 10 football filled or more. smith ships look smiled to mother ship.

It was a object with extremely bright strobing lights that where white and could be seen for at least 10 miles the lights seemed to spread in a horizontal line but  that was really wide it was to hard to see the how wide because of how fast it was moving

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bicycle stop for a couple minutes to cross to the other side of the street when i look up the sun i noticed this object descent and i started taking pictures the object was moving really fast  i knew right sea that this was a ufo  after i took 3 pictures the object disappear i have had other sightings as well have more pictures this the first one i submit
content.summary: I was riding my bicycle  on my way home after work

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my porch one evening and looked up, saw a dark triangle shaped object with three bright lights, one at each corner, hovering over my house at quite a distance but still distinguishable. object did not move except when the two lower lights were drawn up or absorbed by the top light at a unnatural speed which then disappeared just as quickly. it has taken me years to come to terms with what i saw, i do not know what it was, but i know it's been unexplainable thusfar.
content.summary: Dark triangle object with green lights on corner stationary two bottom lights almost "absorbed" by top light and then disappeared entirely

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling in our car near 4196 u.S. 1, monmouth junction, nj 08852 (40.380696, -74.576132). we took a picture of a car near light as we stopped and liked the spare car cover on back of the car. we noticed the ufo like object when we checked the photo after getting back at home. this picture was taken on 06/11/2017 around 6:55 pm.
content.summary: Ufo like object in picture taken near 4196 u.S. 1, monmouth junction, nj 08852

content.detailedDescription: I was playing golf at rustic canyon golf course, and took a couple pictures of the course. i did not notice the object until viewing the pictures. n/a 3rd question. in the second picture of the object i have its basically vanishing or cloaking. its very hard to determine whats happening  i believe these pictures need to be analyzed further. i was extremely excited to view these pictures everyone i've showed them too is pretty impressed with what i captured. n/a 6th question. heres the thing i tried sending the second picture in a text message to myself to see if its the same and it is not. its only on my phone where you can see it cloaking or vanishing, go figure but the first picture you can see the ufo clearly but becomes pix-elated when zoomed in.Please contact me if you would like to set up a meeting. i live north of los angeles.
content.summary: Took pictures of ufo i didnt see it until the pictures

content.detailedDescription:
It was a bright, sunny day in december 2015  and i went outside to get firewood.
i happened to look up and there was a  round, multi-sided, bronze colored craft sitting stationary over the bedroom wing of my house.
it had a metallic appearance, sort of dull bronze colored and it seemed to me that it had part concave and convex areas to it on the side of the craft. in terms of shape, it had, as i recall, 5 sides to it, pentagon shaped.  there were no propellers and no sound, so it could not have been a drone. i would estimate it to be between 20 to 30 ft. wide and about 30 or 40 feet above the house. it was stationary and silent.
i was the only witness and i stood and watched it for several minutes.
what is odd to me, though, is that rather than getting my  phone and taking pictures and documenting the event, or calling other witnesses, i just went ahead and got the firewood and went back inside with  the logs for the fire. i seemed to have forgotten what had just happened; this makes no sense at all to me.
about 2 weeks later , into january of 2016, i began to remember what i had witnessed. 
two main questions in my mind; who was piloting it? and why was it above my house? i am a reliable witness, business owner, aged 64 , and i would have no reason at all to fabricate this  event.
content.summary: Craft hovered over house, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was at a lake sitting in a chair taking pictures with my iphone of hawks in the sky. i noticed the anomaly in my picture later on that night. i thought it might be a reflection off the phone lens. it's just a random still light that seemed to flicker in the sky. i just thought it was weird because i took a few of the same pictures but this one was the only one with this light.
content.summary: It was just a regular day and i happen to be taking pictures and noticed something in one of my shots.

content.detailedDescription:
We flew out of ohare airport to atlanta on thursday, june 8. at 6:45pm local time, approx 15 mins into the flight, at cruising altitude, i looked out of the left side of the plane and backwards -- so looking in a nne direction at about the same altitude as the plane.

i saw a long dark, horizontal cloud or shadow on top of the clouds and above it and to the right was a short vertical black line. as i watched, the short vertical black line started to tip to the right, and within 30 seconds it was at 45 degrees. i scrambled for my phone to take a photo. attached is the photo and a screen capture of the area zoomed in. i continued watching. from 45 degrees the black line went to horizontal, then disappeared. all of that took about 2 minutes. i kept watching. then, about 3 mins later, the horizontal black line was back. it started to lengthen, to about 4 times its original length, then disappeared. throughout the entire episode, the long dark, horizontal cloud or shadow below this did not change.

i looked up to see if there was anything that could be making a shadow and did not see anything.

way off in the distance, to the north, i could see 2-3 more of these long dark, horizontal clouds or shadows. i don't think they are in the photo.

as the plane continued to travel away from the phenomena, eventually i was too far away to see anything more.
content.summary: From a plane, i saw a short dark vertical line that rotated to horizontal, disappeared and reappeared, above a much larger horizontal dark line/shadow on top of clouds that did not move

content.detailedDescription:
I took advantage of a break in the storm which hit cape town on wednesday 7th july 2017, at approximately 13h15 and drove down to the beach road at blouberg strand to see what the effect of the storm was on the sea. i took two pictures in quick succession, trying to catch the wave as it broke over onto the pavement (in the first picture) and then the sea foam rushing into the road (in the second picture).  i did not see any ufo with the naked eye.  when reviewing the picture later, i noticed an unknown object in the second picture.  in this picture, the grey "splotches" in the foreground are from dirty sea foam kicked up onto my windscreen from the car in front of me.  if you look at the top left hand side of the picture in the clouds and zoom in - you will notice that the grey splotches fade out, but the object remains clear and solid.  this object does not appear in the first picture i took a couple of seconds before.
there were many, many people on the beachfront at the same time, all with their cameras.  i am hoping that one or more of them were also able to capture this object.
i have attached both pictures for your information.
content.summary: Ufo captured while taking pictures during a storm in cape town on 7th july 2017

content.detailedDescription: i was standing outside of my house happened to look up in the sky and seen a round object floating it moved from left to right or forward and back a couple of times stood still and then shot up in the air and left a small trail behind it.
content.summary: i seen what looked to be around silver object in the sky moved from right to left then shot in the air leaving a trail of smoke

content.detailedDescription: I had travelled to blackpoool with a friend on the friday nite 2/06/2017, at 22.00hrs,and after booking into the hotel, we went for a drink in the hotel bar this was by then 22.30.Another guest was already in the bar,i required a cigarette,and so went outside to the hotel front facing the sea and beach.I could see that the sky was clear,a full moon to my left and i presume venus shinning slightly lower to the left of the moon.The sky had the usual stars twinkling away,and i observed the odd high altitude planes moving coparatively slowly going through the sky.I was taken by an exceptionally bright object coming over the horizon from the see,this object shone brilliantly and moved at a pace faster than the planes i had seen ealier.I watched this for a minute or so.The other guest came out,for a smoke also.I pointed out the object to him,and so we both stood watching thsi thing coming over our heads,it was round shaped,then would appear  to be oval,glowing with this intensity that outshone all the other stars above it,and was at least 3/4 times brighter than the moon. we could see planes flying high above this going at a snails pace compared to how fast this object moved.It maintained a constant pathway straight forwards.The other guest summised that it could be the mears space station travelling through the nitetime sky,but tho this is possible,i fell its altitude was far too low for such a flightpath.We both continued to watch this object travel inwards ,until it was no longer visible,at this point we re-entered the hotel
content.summary: Very bright round/oval shaped object,that would increase in brightness,yet never going dull,just illuminating extra white white light as if it was made of light.Obsevered coming over the horizon from the see,travelling inland on a constant straight path.

content.detailedDescription:
On 6/11 at 4am i woke and looked out 2nd story window to see a very bright light (thinking a planet) in the night sky. i continued to watch as object hovered, slightly moving. seemed to pulse and was too close to be a planet or star.  sighting was very bright and i believe i saw white, red and blue/green light rotating on it or pulsing. the object looked disc like.  the object was a good distance above the tree lines. airplanes passed with in the area and i could tell this was not a plane and not a helicopter by the size and movement.  i woke my husband around 4:45 am. he also thought it was very strange. by this time the sun was coming up and the object was just as bright and visible.F we went to bed at 5am and when i woke at 5:33 am the object was further south west. i tried taking photos and video with an iphone which didn't come out well.

that evening my husband and i saw the same object in the same spot in the sky. we we're thinking this must be something explainable, or we're losing it! it was around 11pm. the object was in the se sky again in the same spot and appeared very bright and hovered. i told my husband i couldn't take this its to weird and headed upstairs for bed. as i got in bed and looked at the object it took off! it flew unlike any plan i've seen and seemed to go on its side then horizontal. it moved very fast up and over our home and nw. my husband also witnessed this. we ran out side and could hear a faint humming buzzing sound. we we're both in aww. chatted for a minute and went back to bed. then to my amazement or i'm really crazy i saw the strangest park. a very bright ball of whitish yellow light was to the east of the original object in sky. it was big! above the trees 500 ft or so and hovered and moved irregularly up and then in a blink disappeared.
content.summary: 6/11at 4am woke and looked out window to see very bright light in sky. light appeared to pulse and have an array of different colored lights. hovered moving very slightly till 5:33 am when it started moving sw.  at 11pm saw same light/object in sky same.

content.detailedDescription: I was in gosport in.And was taking my dog out to do her business .I looked up toward the stars ....Slightly east and almost straight above my head.I caught sight of what i first thought was a satellite.Moments later i observed 3 or 4 more orbs in the same area of sky. they seemed to have no certain path and changed directions at will. they did this for a matter of about 5 minutes . and as i was watching them they disappeared 1 by 1 until only 1 remained. this 1 was on a heading toward the south.It stopped then dimmed,changed direction and started heading north as toward indianapolis .Then it looked as though it had landing lights and proceeded north. after about a minute it became extremely bright.Brighter and bigger than any star in the night sky stopped flickered a few times then totally disappeared.I have observed these same type orbs at least 5 times in my life.Dating back to new mexico in 1975.This is my first encounter here in indiana.I wonder why this so frequently happens to me.It is as if they are putting on a show for me.Maybe it is because of my love for the beauty of a night sky and i just look to the skies more often than most.....Not sure.
content.summary: Observed 4 or 5 star like spheres changing directions then stopping, starting,and changing direction at incredible speeds

content.detailedDescription: my mother is 90 years old, disabled, and has alzheimer's disease. it was 3 am, she was singing gospel songs. i heard with the baby monitor i have, i went on the front porch to smoke a cigar. (porch facing west) i saw a bright light coming down, i went to investigate. some lights similar to "star treks" transporters occurred, what looked like a gentleman, with eyebrows reaching to side of head. he told me, there will be no further contact until all nations learn how to settle their differences in peace. i heard a noise at my burning barrel, i turned to see what it was, i turned my head back, gentleman was gone, object in sky was gone.
content.summary: Saw light coming down, investigated, walked out, being appeared, information given, no more contact until world peace is acheieved

content.detailedDescription: At home my wife and i were on the porch around 11:15-11:20 when she pointed out a single orange light moving west very slowly. we walked out into the yard and i noticed it was actually 2 orange lights. she thought it was lanterns until she saw they were moving toward us rather than up. it stopped and hovered for about 20 seconds and a bright white light "popped out". immediately after this light appeared the orange lights began moving southwest at a much faster speed. the white light looked like a star, but within 10 seconds it dissipated. the object came over our house and i noticed a 3rd orange light behind the front "leading" 2. it made no noise, not a single sound. it gained speed until it was past the treeline. the event was approximately 3-5 minutes total. i made an attempt to get a picture as it went over my house but the lights would not appear on my screen as if invisible to my camera but not my eyes.
content.summary: Stationary orange lights in shape of triangle "dropped" bright light which quickly dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2150 hours on 06112017, i observed a bright (focused beam like sunlight) light which appeared in front of my vehicle while driving. the light was circular and shined down onto the road. the width shining onto the ground was about 15 feet in diameter. i hit my brakes and stopped just before the light. i looked up but could not see anything, and then the light went out. the light lasted approximately 3-4 seconds. no aircraft and no sounds. i continued driving for another half mile and observed two military helicopters on the north side of the airport traveling north away from the airport which is 2 miles away from where the incident took place. i did not experience any feelings other than being intrigued as to what just happened. i did not lose sight of the object. only observed the light appearing from nothing. i am hesitant to report this because i've told two people and they laughed. my background includes a ph.D. and 20+ years in law enforcement.
content.summary: Driving and bright light appeared. drove into light, hit brakes, looked out window saw nothing. lasted 3-4 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was a friend of mine. i was learning how to drive and at that time i was practicing in a volky of 1971. the happened when we turned from río piedras to hato rey, near banco popular at ave. luis munoz rivera. we were arguing about the existence of ufo whne he beat me in my knee and said to me, "so you dont believe in ufo then what is that and then over the roof of banco popular we saw the ufo. cras stop engiones and traffic lights were off sudden when we get down the car....All the people in the avenues get down also....In that moment in less than a secon the ufo moved were in now the urban train in santurce, stop 26...We started the engine and hen arrived there and in that moment the ufo dissapeared in the same way it came. it was the most marvelous thing ever happened to me and friend who lives in virgina.

this happened in puerto rico in the caribbean but you dont provide space lost to write....
content.summary: This was in puerto rico, caribbean territory of unites states.

content.detailedDescription: Bright yellow object, nw to se, took 75 sec to traverse 135 degrees to horizon. binocular wobble makes me believe object was very large and far away; distance and/or altitude
content.summary: Nw to se orange object

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i where driving home from work when seen bright light descend quickly to mere where we were driving as it descended from above us the the bright light turned into a purple light then landed we both so overwhelmed and scared at the same time we watched from a distance of 20m and the light disappeared then everything went really dark we stayed still all of sudden the human like creature was in front of us and spoke to us in english have this stone and i will return when the time is right and then onwards i lost mermory of the creature leaving
content.summary: Was overwhelmed didn't take to much interest in the transportation just amazing creature i met

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My fiancé and i were in our backyard and observed numerous fireball like ufos slowly moving across the sky fairly close above our neighbors houses. i told her to run and grab the phone to record this as this is the second event we have witnessed in the last few months and we failed to capture it the first time.  our first thoughts were that these were some new kind of memorial balloons of some sort that we were unaware of?  they moved across the sky similar to hot air balloons but seem to be made entirely of fire. the first time we saw one of these was a few months ago and we saw it up very close as it rose directly over our neighbors house.  i would describe it as a large sack of fire being carried by some type of curved black claw type of structure directly above it that can barley be seen. in this event that we just recorded you cannot see as much detail as all of these fireballs are further from us. they eventually all ascended and disappeared into the atmosphere.
content.summary: Encountered and video taped a dozen or so fireball like ufos for 6 min duration
